page.title: 01EVERY DAY THINGS IN LUBENHAM
page.content: Each day the children under 11 go to Lubenham school, at 9.10 AM they go into school and they finish at 3.30 PM .Each summer the school has a school sports day. Each month there is bingo in the village hall. Then in summer a lot of children go down to the river Welland they take tyre inner tubes which they use as a boat.At the village park there is a slide, some swings,a roundabout and a chinese swing. We have a village fete on the green and some of the cub scouts help on some of the stalls.All this happens in the summer holidays. Then it is back to school where they have recently started a running and a science club, for the 1st 2nd 3rd and the 4th years. There are jumble sales all through
